Entries.dad5: @ To ^ I was worried about you and the grandchildren, so I sent Bella, your nursemaid, to you. She should have arrived at your farm by now. Bella only cares about you, so please treat her well! ^ With love, Dad[#]Dad's Letter #5

Entries.Bella: The wind and rain are quite harsh, Master. It would be best to refrain from going out today.$k

Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Bella: Master, I heard you collapsed in the mines.#$b#I prepared an elixir for such occasions. Please take this and regain your strength.[773]$0
Entries.Town_DumpsterDiveComment_Bella: ...Master. I will keep this a secret.

Entries.16554812: none/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "Greetings, Master... Finally, just the two of us. I've been watching over you, you know... Learning everything about you. When you wake up, when you go to sleep... who you spend time with. And lately, I've noticed something strange."/pause 700/emote Bella 20/speak Bella "Abigail, for example. She keeps smiling at you. Waving. Laughing at your jokes. That's not a problem, of course. Because I always handle problems."/pause 800/emote Bella 1/speak Bella "Now... tell me, Master. How may I serve you today?"/pause 700/quickQuestion "By the way, I'm curious... What do you think about me?#You're... a bit intense.(break)switchEvent Bella_16554812_intense#I think you're sweet.(break)switchEvent Bella_16554812_sweet#Should I be worried?(break)switchEvent Bella_16554812_worried
Entries.Bella_16554812_intense: portrait Bella serious/speak Bella "Oh? Intense?"/pause 500/emote Bella 16/speak Bella "I suppose that's one way to put it. But, Master... I only act this way because I care."/pause 700/emote Bella 24/speak Bella "Don't you want someone who watches over you? Protects you?"/pause 500/end
Entries.Bella_16554812_sweet: portrait Bella blush/speak Bella "S-Sweet?"/pause 500/emote Bella 26/speak Bella "Oh, Master... You always know just what to say."/pause 700/emote Bella 28/speak Bella "But don't think flattery will distract me from my duties."/pause 500/end
Entries.Bella_16554812_worried: portrait Bella smirk/speak Bella "Worried?"/pause 500/emote Bella 18/speak Bella "Master... worrying about me is pointless."/pause 700/emote Bella 1/speak Bella "I told youâ€”I take care of everything."/pause 500/end

19123456.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "The cherry blossoms remind me of my childhood..."/end

19123457.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "Master... The fireflies tonight..."/animate Bella "Bella_sing"/end

19123458.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "This maple leaf... It matches your hair..."/animate Bella "Bella_reading"/end

19123459.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "The first snow always made the academy's floors slippery..."/animate Bella "Bella_clean"/end

19123460.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "A mermaid pendant...?"/animate Bella "Bella_cook"/end

16554821.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "Good morning, my beloved Master."/animate Bella "Bella_sleep"/end

16554822.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "You've worked hard today, Master."/end

16554823.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "Our child said 'Papa' today!"/end

16554826.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "Happy anniversary, my beloved Master."/end

16554824.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "The spring flowers remind me of our wedding day."/end

16554825.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "The rain sounds lovely against our roof."/end

16554817.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "Master, I've prepared something special for you."/end

16554818.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "Master! This bouquet..."/animate Bella "Bella_sing"/end

16554819.Script: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Bella 64 18 2/pause 500/speak Bella "I noticed you've been working hard."/end

Entries.Bella_SeasonalGift: I made this {0} thinking of the season, Master.$1

Entries.Bella_History1: @ To ^ I found these old academy photos while organizing. The uniform hasn't changed much... though my heart has grown far lighter since coming to your farm. ^ -Bella [#]Maid Academy Photos

Entries.Bella: I heard the winner of the Egg Festival receives a hat as a prize. I wish you success, Master.
I will watch from the sidelines with the young master and miss. Please do your best, Master.

This year's Luau soup will surely be delicious.#$b#If the soup tastes bad despite the crops you grew, it will be due to the poor combinations made by the other villagers.#$b#If the soup is unappetizing, I have prepared sandwiches for the young master and miss to have for lunch.
I heard that on the last day of summer in Stardew Valley, the Lunaloos come to the beach to dance. It sounds like a beautiful sight.#$b#I'm looking forward to it.$1
The crops you grew are very special, Master. I'm sure you'll win first place in this showcase.$h
There's a strange smell coming from that maze... Please be careful, Master.
Last night, after you fell asleep, I prepared your fishing rod. I hope you can win the ice fishing competition.$1
The young master and miss are excited to find out who their secret friend is. I hope you receive a wonderful gift.$h

Entries.NPC.cs.4274: You remembered my birthday... Thank you so much, Master!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4275: This birthday gift is wonderful, Master! Thank you for celebrating my birthday!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4276: Oh, today is my birthday, isn't it? Thank you so much for remembering, Master!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4277: You remembered my birthday! I truly appreciate it, Master!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4278: Thank you for the birthday gift, Master. $0
Entries.NPC.cs.4279: ...Thank you for the birthday gift, Master. $0
Entries.NPC.cs.4280: A birthday gift, I see. Thank you, Master.$0
Entries.NPC.cs.4281: Oh, a birthday gift. Thank you, Master.$0
Entries.NPC.cs.4282: This is the best birthday I've had in a long time, Master. Thank you for making it special!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4283: I wasn't expecting a gift, Master. You've made my day brighter!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4284: Your thoughtfulness is truly touching, Master. Thank you for the gift.$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4285: A gift from you, Master? I'm honored. Thank you.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: I recall watching movies with you when you were younger!

AfterMovie.Text: I was delighted to watch the movie with you! Thank you for inviting me!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: I guess this movie is one that even the town kids like.$h

DuringMovie.Script: message "I want to pay tribute to the courage of that young tree..It's touching."

AfterMovie.Text: It was a really touching movie. I'd like to see you again later!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: It seems like a good movie for you and your maid..

DuringMovie.Script: /message "(BellaIt seems like a good movie for you and your maid.)"

AfterMovie.Text: I need to tell the muppet and the lady a fairy tale book!

BeforeMovie.Text: It looks like it's going to be fun. I'm looking forward to it.$h

DuringMovie.Text: /message "(Bella covers her mouth with her hand, trying to hold back laughter!)"

AfterMovie.Text: I almost burst out laughing. That was a fun movie!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: Oh.. I don't see scary movies very well. If I'm surprised in the middle, please understand...$s

DuringMovie.Text: /message "(BellaClose your eyes... I don't want to see the movie..)"

AfterMovie.Text: ... Sorry. This movie doesn't seem to fit with me.

BeforeMovie.Text: Oh, this is a famous work, so I'm looking forward to it!$h

AfterMovie.Text: Good! Thank you for inviting me to the cinema, Master!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: This film is fun, so I'm looking forward to it.

AfterMovie.Text: It was really great! Thank you for inviting me!

BeforeMovie.Text: Oh...Sorry. It's not my favorite movie...

AfterMovie.Text: I'm sorry, this movie is rather difficult for me to understand...

BeforeMovie.Text: Oh, '{0}'! I remember watching it a long time ago with my fellow maid! It brings back fond memories of those days. I wonder if it will still feel just as exciting now! $h

This is a movie I once watched with a fellow maid, and I found it incredibly entertaining and engaging. The witty dialogues and the intriguing plot kept me captivated throughout, making it a truly memorable experience. I would highly recommend it as an enjoyable choice for a cinema outing!$h
Hmm, is this a movie that you enjoy, Master? I hope it brings you joy and entertainment. Even if it may not be my favorite, I will do my best to appreciate it alongside you.

Entries.MovieInvite_InvitedBySomeoneElse_Bella: I'm sorry... I already have plans to see a movie with someone else. See you at the theater.
Entries.MovieInvite_FarmerAlreadySeen_Bella: I'm sorry... I have to take care of the young master and miss.
Entries.MovieInvite_AlreadySeen: I'm sorry. I already saw a movie this week...$2
Entries.MovieInvite_Invited_Bella: I'm...!#$b#I'll come with you as soon as I finish my chores.#$b#I look forward to watching a movie with you, Master.$h
Entries.MovieInvite_Rejected: I'm sorry... I can't go because I'm busy with chores.$2
